author: Eric Levitz
title: Trump’s Labor Department Fights to Protect Workers From Benefits
description: Eugene Scalia is working hard to shield Uber drivers from the threat of income support.
content: Weeks after Donald Trumps victory in the 2016 election, the president-elects economic adviser Stephen Moore delivered some tough news to House Republicans: Just as Reagan converted the GOP into a conservative party, Trump has converted the GOP into a populist… [+4897 chars]
